movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: S. Sathiyamoorthy
Starring by: Sharran Kumar, Jai Quehaeni, Mishal
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Charles wants to catch hold of Karthiga and make her understand his love for her. Shaffiq needs Karthiga to get back the smuggled diamonds that he had entrusted with her. Meanwhile, Karthiga witnesses a murder at her deserted office and the killers are after her.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Dhee Srinivas
Starring by: Dhee Srinivas, Jai Praveen, Sravani
Genres: Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Digbandhana is a Telugu movie starring Dhee Srinivas in a prominent role. It is a horror thriller written and directed by Dhee Srinivas.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Rishi
Starring by: Kartikeya, Simrat Kaur, Murli Sharma
Genres: Music, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: When the materialistic businessman, Gopikrishna, is diagnosed with a life-threatening disease, he decides to take a 30 days trip with his son, Karthik, who also has a materialistic approach to life. Along the way, they meet various people who give them a fresh perspective on life, while Gopikrishna tries to hide the fact of his impending death from his son.

movieInfo:
Directed by: J. Prabhakar Reddy, Maruthi Dasari
Writtem nu: Maruthi Dasari
Starring by: Sudheer Babu Posani, Nandita Raj, Praveen
Genres: Drama, Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sudheer (Sudheer Babu), Praveen (Praveen) and Nandhu (Nandhita) are three dejected and depressed youngsters. They are fed up with their lives and decide to commit suicide. The three of them travel to a remote farmhouse to spend the last moments of their life. On the way, they are joined by Giri (Giri).

movieInfo:
Directed by: Minjur Gopi
Starring by: Nayanthara, Vignesh, Sunu Lakshmi
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film tells the tale of an honest district collector played by Nayanthara who tries everything possible to make the negligent government take care of the rampant water scarcity and injustice in rural areas that comes under her jurisdiction.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sashi Kiran Tikka
Written by: Rahul Pakala, Abburi Ravi
Starring by: Adivi Sesh, Sobhita Dhulipala, Prakash Raj
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Arjun Kumar, a martyr’s son and a trained agent from an ultra-competitive training program, sets out a journey to track down the people who are responsible for framing him as a most wanted criminal.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gabor Csupo
Written by: Jeff Stockwell, David Paterson
Starring by: Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Family, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: English
movieDescription: Jesse Aarons trained all summer to become the fastest runner in school, so he’s very upset when newcomer Leslie Burke outruns him and everyone else. Despite this and other differences, including that she’s rich, he’s poor, and she’s a city girl, he’s a country boy, the two become fast friends. Together, they create Terabithia, a land of monsters, trolls, ogres, and giants and rule as king and queen. This friendship helps Jess deal with the tragedy that makes him realize what Leslie taught him.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Phanindra Narsetti
Starring by: Gowtam, Chandini Chowdary, John Kottoly
Genres: Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Photographer Neela and artist Manu share a unique association — their relationship is the only bright spot in their lives and one that gives them hope. However, destiny has other ideas.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vijay A L
Starring by: Prabhu Deva, Aishwarya Rajesh, Ditya
Genres: Drama, Musical
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Lakshmi (Ditya Bhande) is interested in dancing, but her mother is strictly against it. What happens when Lakshmi joins dancing competition Pride Of India Jr’s with the help of VK (Prabhu Deva).

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Bala
Starring by: Jyothika, G.V. Prakash Kumar, Rockline Venkatesh
Genres: Action, Drama, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A cop unveils expose the truth about kaathavarayan, a young man who accused of abusing and assaulting his girl friend. Jhansi (Jyothika) is a sincere and ruthless cop, who is not only known for her violent interrogation but also for insubordination towards her higher officials. Her plan to go for a foreign tour with her family is disrupted by a sensitive case which involves a slum-dwelling minor girl Raasi (debutante Ivana) and her lover Gali (GV Prakash Kumar), which leads the latter to be jailed.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Veera Shankar
Written by: Pawan Kalyan, Satyanand
Starring by: Pawan Kalyan, Meera Jasmine, Ashish Vidyarthi
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Shankar aka Gudumba Shankar, a petty-thief, falls in love with Gowri. When Shankar learns that Gowri and her family are harassed by powerful goon Kumaraswamy, he sets up a plot to fool kumaraswamy.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ashok G.
Written by: Chandrasekhar, Ashok G.
Starring by: Nani, Haripriya, Bindhu Madhavi
Genres: Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: PJ (Nani) is the grandson of a wealthy zamindar. PJ is an irresponsible youngster who is spoiled by the pampering and excessive money. His grandfather writes a will with several conditions before he dies. He writes the will that PJ will inherit his entire wealth only if he completes his graduation as a common man without any luxuries. The rest of the story is all about how PJ learns about values and life as he achieves his goal.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gopal B.
Written by: Gopalakrishna Paruchuri, Venkateswara Rao Paruchuri
Starring by: Venkatesh Daggubati, Divya Bharti, Vanisri
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film begins with election campaigning in the village Bobbili. Sundaraiyah (Gummadi) and Rajeswari Devi (Vanisree) are strong opponents in elections. Rajeswari Devi and her elder brother Ahobala Rao (Kota Srinivasa Rao) play a lot of tactics to win the elections. But their younger brother Suryam (Vidya Sagar) supports Sundaraiyah and also loves his daughter Rajyalakshmi (Sumitra) and she becomes pregnant. Everybody dishonors her and Ahobala Rao wants to take an advantage of the situation in the election campaign.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kodavatiganti Dayaa
Starring by: Anisha Ambrose, Tanikella Bharani, Nagendra Babu
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Janaki Ram, (Rahul Venkat), son of an idealistic school teacher gets a government job and moves to the city. Disillusioned by the rampant corruption, he stands up to fight for the values instilled by his father.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Satya
Starring by: Naveen Chandra, Ritu Varma, M.S.Narayana
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Naa Rakumarudu is a love story of two college students. Bindu is enthusiastic and vivacious who falls for rich man Vaishnav. Vaishnav loves bindu much when situation is precarious he changes his mind. Bindhu cannot take his hate and decides to end her life.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Srinivas Chakravarthi
Starring by: Naga Shaurya, Kashmira, Yamini Bhaskar
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Naga Shourya is a young man who always wants women to be independent in life. In this process, he solves a girl called Manasa’s(Kashmira) problems and falls in love during the course of time. Just when things seem to be going fine, his dad(Sivaji Raja) fixes his match with Satya(Yamini Bhaskar). To avoid this tricky situation, Shourya reveals to Satya’s family that he is a gay.
